external_games.name: Match Three Pirates! Heir to Davy Jones
Match Three Pirates! Heir to Davy Jones

name: Match Three Pirates! Heir to Davy Jones
storyline:
Challenging and fun Match 3 Adventure game, where you enter a swashbuckling world of pirate adventure and find out if you can escape the curse of Davy Jones’ Locker.

Davy Jones was a pirate, who didn’t want to die. He wished to furrow the sea forever. And he raised the dark forces and create own magic world - Davy Jones’ Locker where there was no time and no one was getting old, and Davy was opening portals to our world to lure people into Davy Jones’ Locker to be a pirate and play the Davy Jones games… forever!

On some day Bobby was walking at the fair. And everything was fine till he saw that pirate’s pavilion. Bobby fell into the trap of legendary Davy Jones, and you jumped after him.

Now you should chase Davy Jones in this magic world, and save Bobby... by any costs!
summary: Challenging and fun Match 3 Adventure game, where you enter a swashbuckling magic world of a legendary pirate. Bobby disappears in Davy Jones’ Locker... Can you save him in time?
